name: Coconut
description: We let developers spend their time on their application code, not building a brand new encoding system from scratch. Formerly HeyWatch and founded in 2006, Coconut is a cloud-based video encoding platform that lets developers move video encoding to the cloud with just a few lines of code. We know that developers spend a lot of time on their application code, so we want to make things easier and more productive for them offering beautiful code, API and documentation.

apis.name: HeyWatch Video Encoding API
apis.description: HeyWatch is a professional, powerful, and scalable cloud video encoding software as a service (SaaS). The HeyWatch Core Video Encoding allows users to integrate video encoding services into third-party applications. The video can can be encoded and output into several formats including: HTML5, iOS, Android, WebM, MP4, H.264, or flash video. HeyWatch also offers the Robot API to simplify and automate the use of the Core Video Encoding API.
